p: MeRIP-Seq of the EV71 methylome was carried out according to a previously published protocol ( 46). In brief, total cellular RNA extracted from EV71-infected Vero cells was fragmented by ZnCl 2 followed by ethanol precipitation. Fragmented RNA was incubated with an anti-m 6A antibody (Synaptic Systems, 1:300). MeRIP was conducted as previously described ( 46). The eluted RNA and input were subjected to high-throughput sequencing using standard protocols (Illumina, San Diego, CA, USA). The MeRIP-Seq data were analyzed as described previously ( 32).
